hooks.command: echo セッション開始: %date% %time% >> C:\Users\user\.claude\session.log
echo セッション終了: %date% %time% >> C:\Users\user\.claude\session.log

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model_name=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed 's|/mnt/c/Users/user|~|'); git_branch=$(cd "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'no git'); time=$(date '+%H:%M:%S'); printf "%s | %s | git:%s | %s" "$model_name" "$current_dir" "$git_branch" "$time"
